pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiomics Data Integration // Provides functions to do 'O2PLS- DA' analysis for multiple omics data integration. The algorithm came from "O2-PLS, a two-block (XY) latent variable regression (LVR) method with an integral OSC filter" which published by Johan Trygg and Svante Wold at 2003 doi:10.1002/cem.775. 'O2PLS' is a bidirectional multivariate regression method that aims to separate the covariance between two data sets (it was recently extended to multiple data sets) (Lfstedt and Trygg, 2011 doi:10.1002/cem.1388; Lfstedt et al., 2012 doi:10.1016/j.aca.2013.06.026) from the systematic sources of variance being specific for each data set separately.
